structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases

law.catch_line: Sentence To Jail Or House Of Correction In Any County
law.text: Whoever is convicted of a crime, punishable by imprisonment in the jail or house of correction, may be sentenced to a jail or house of correction of any county, and the master or keeper shall receive and detain him in the same manner as if he had been sentenced by a court sitting in the county where such jail or house of correction is situated.
